title: Alessandra Ambrosio wears same peach bikini she debuted on Friday in new shot as she lays in hammock
text:
It looked so nice she wore it twice.

Alessandra Ambrosio shared a second shot of herself in the beautiful peach bikini that she had worn on Friday.

She took to Instagram on Saturday to post the snap of herself relaxing in a hammock on a beach, flashing her decolletage.

So nice she wore it twice: Alessandra Ambrosio shared a second shot of herself in the beautiful peach bikini that she had worn on Friday as she relaxed in a hammock on Saturday

The Brazilian bombshell, 38, captioned it: 'Dreaminnn #saturdayvibes.'

She co-launched her swimwear line GAL Floripa this year and Alessandra is definitely the best model for her brand.

Meanwhile, Alessandra was also seen out and about in West Hollywood on Friday.

Sweeping her hair into a ponytail, the ex-Victoria's Secret Angel wore a burnt-orange T-shirt tucked into her loose-fitted high-waisted jeans.

Hard at work: Alessandra first showed off her bikini body while modeling the peach two-piece from her brand GAL Floripa on Instagram on Friday

Alessandra collaborated with her sister Aline Ambrosio and pal Gisele Coria to launch a new swimwear line, which debuted in March.

The brand takes its title from a nickname for Florianopolis, the Brazilian city where Alessandra gave birth to both of her children.

Ale, as her fans affectionately call her, is currently in a relationship with Italian hunk Nicolo Oddi, who founded the fashion brand Alanui with his sister Carlotta.

On the go: The 38-year-old Brazilian bombshell was seen rocking sunglasses on a chain while out and about in West Hollywood on Friday

Last year, Alessandra broke her decade-long engagement to RE/DONE founder Jaime Mazur, 38, with whom she shares two children - Anja, 11, and Noah, seven.

Neither Jamie nor Alessandra, who got engaged in 2008, publicly confirmed the breakup reports when they surfaced last March.

A source had dished to Us Weekly that the pair were 'trying to keep their split on the down low, but Alessandra has been out and about ready to mingle and hasn’t been taking Jamie to anything.'

Alessandra, who walked a Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Miami Beach roughly three months after delivering Anja, left the brand at the end of 2017.

She announced her departure after walking the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show in Shanghai.

That was her 17th outing at the annual extravaganza.
description: It looked so nice she wore it twice. On Saturday, the Brazilian beauty posted a second shot of herself wearing the sexy two piece from her GAL Floripa line that she had donned on Friday
